thread.title: Moms Demand Action presents documentary about guns
thread.title_full: Moms Demand Action presents documentary about guns | NOLA.com

author: NOLA Community Submission
title: Moms Demand Action presents documentary about guns
text:
he National Council of Jewish Women, Moms Demand Action for Gun Sense in America and the Louisiana Children's Rights will present a test screening of the new documentary film "91%: A Film About Guns in America" Nov. 9 at 6 p.m. Caf√© Instanbul at The Healing Center, 2372 St. Claude Avenue. The film will be followed by a brief discussion and Q & A with filmmaker John Richie.
To learn more, visit ncjwgno.nationbuilder.com/film_screening_91_percent .
The discussion will continue Nov. 12 from 6 to 8 p.m. at Rebellion, 748 Camp St., at a social justice happy hour featuring a panel of women speaking on the topic of gun violence.
NCJW's social justice happy hour series, "Moving the Ball Forward,'' celebrates New Orleans most dedicated advocates for social justice and features all women panels sharing their experiences and expertise on issue facing our community. To find out more about "Moving the Ball Forward: Gun Violence,'' visit ncjwgno.nationbuilder.com/mtbf_gun_violence .
